us.codecraft.webmagic.model.annotation

Annotation Type ExtractByUrl


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface ExtractByUrl
    Define a extractor for url. Only regex can be used.
    Since:
    0.2.0

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean multi
      Define whether the extractor return more than one result.
      boolean notNull
      Define whether the field can be null.
      If set to 'true' and the extractor get no result, the entire class will be discarded.
      java.lang.String value
      Extractor expression, only regex can be used

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.String value
        Extractor expression, only regex can be used
        Returns:
        extractor expression
        Default:
        ""

      • notNull

        public abstract boolean notNull
        Define whether the field can be null.
        If set to 'true' and the extractor get no result, the entire class will be discarded.
        Returns:
        whether the field can be null
        Default:
        false

      • multi

        public abstract boolean multi
        Define whether the extractor return more than one result. When set to 'true', the extractor return a list of string (so you should define the field as List).
        Returns:
        whether the extractor return more than one result
        Default:
        false
